# What is R-Ladies? {.smaller}

-   R-Ladies is a world-wide organization with the mission of promoting **gender diversity in the R community**

-   Started in San Francisco in 2012 and now has **206 chapters and more than 93,000** members globally (check out rladies.org for a Shiny dashboard)

# 2022 Fall Schedule

Each week in October we will be featuring an Introductory R topic during our OctobeR ExtRavaganza

-   **`Tonight:`** Wrangling Data in the Tidyverse with **Joscelin Rocha-Hidalgo** (Organization)
-   **`Next Tuesday Oct.11:`** Intro to Iteration: for loops and functions with **Merve Ileri Tayar** (Washington University)
-   **`Tuesday Oct.17:`** Clinical reporting with gtsummary with **Daniel Sjoberg** (Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center)
-   **`Tuesday Oct.27:`** Intro to Quarto with **Isabella Velasquez** (Posit)
